title: [Plains of Bone, Virktoth's Path]
description: The stair continues at a gentle slope.  Hairline cracks fan out from the center of several of the steps.  Other than the cracks, no other damage is apparent to the steps.  Moonlight washes over the stairway, bathing everything around in its pale glow.
The stair continues at a gentle slope.  Hairline cracks fan out from the center of several of the steps.  Other than the cracks, no other damage is apparent to the steps.
